page.title: 05Whittlesford Doctors Surgery
page.content: A decision was made early in 1985, by the{Family Practitioner Committee}to close the surgery in Campion Close, North Road. The Committee arranged a closure date with the doctors. The patients were notified of this arrangement and have the opportunity of going to another surgery. The {Whittlesford Parish Council}Chairman contacted the{Family Practitioner {Committee}to discuss the possibility of vacancies at the{Shelford Health {Centre Practice.}Help with the provision of transport to{Sawston}was also sought. The Parish Council Clerk contacted Cambus about the provision of a bus link between Whittlesford and Sawston. There is now a 'For Sale' sign outside the village surgery.
